In practice, Andy Coulson made up his mind before Christmas that he would have to go. Andy Coulson was running at 70 per cent of his capacity- at best, says one ally.`` He wasn't prepared to work on that basis.'' ago, has called on the Legislature to enact by March 1 an austere spending plan that includes deep reductions in welfare, health care for the poor and the state's universities, among other programs. Get it done, the sooner the better, Bill Lockyer said Saturday during his appearance at a conference sponsored by the Institute of Governmental Studies at UC Berkeley. If not, he said,`` We will run out of money to pay the bills.''

business relationships, government outreach and technology thought leadership'', according to the official Google blog spot. Mr Eric Schmidt would continue to act as an advisor to Mr Page and co-founder Mr Sergey Brin . Page will take charge of Google's day-to-day operations as Chief Executive Officer starting April 4. Sergey Brin will focus on strategic projects, in particular working on new products, Mr Eric Schmidt said in the blog spot. The management reshuffle has been brought about to`` streamline decision making and create clearer lines of responsibility and accountability'' at the top of the company, he added
